sentences.en: And most importantly of all, communicate an idea; don't NAG about it.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是, 交流各自的想法, 避免挑剔批评.

sentences.en: Aunt Molly is a nag about regular meals.
sentences.cn: 莫莉姨妈是一日三餐都挑三拣四的人。

sentences.en: Does not mean to nag or scold, it means to listen.
sentences.cn: 顺其自然并非意味着抱怨或斥责, 而是意味着倾听.

sentences.en: I have never seen a nag like this one.
sentences.cn: 我从来没见过这样的矮小马.

sentences.en: It could hardly have been a worse one -- an old nag, not worth much of anything.
sentences.cn: 那是一匹老马, 一匹不中用的马.

sentences.en: It was not in Kay's nature to nag; she let it drop.
sentences.cn: 论性格,恺向来不打破砂锅问到底, 她不再罗嗦了.

sentences.en: Methods 24 hour urinary ablumin ( Alb ), transferrin ( TRF ), IgG, retinal - bingding protein ( RBP ), N - acetyl - glucosaminidase ( NAG ) , fasting blood glucose, blood creatinine ( Scr ) and so on were measured.
sentences.cn: 方法　测定104例2型糖尿病患者24h白蛋白 ( Alb ) 、 转铁蛋白 ( TRF ) 、 N乙酰βD氨基 葡萄糖苷酶 ( NAG ) 、 免疫球蛋白 ( IgG) 、 视黄醇结合蛋白 ( RBP ) 以及空腹血糖 、 血尿素氮等指标.

sentences.en: Nobody likes to work with a nag.
sentences.cn: 谁也不愿与好唠叨的人一起共事.

sentences.en: Pride, envy, remorse nag his characters.
sentences.cn: 骄傲 、 嫉妒 、 悔恨折磨着他笔下的人物.

sentences.en: She does not NAG YOU - She becomes VERBALLY REPETITIVE.
sentences.cn: 她并不唠叨,只是言词反复.

sentences.en: Some children complain that their parents nag at them.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子报怨他们父母老是数落他们.

sentences.en: The contents of the plasma ET, Bun, Cr and urine NAG, RBP, α1 - MG and � � - GTP were determined.
sentences.cn: 两组病人分别与麻醉前 、 手术后24h、48h、 72h检测 血浆内皮素 、 尿素氮、肌酐含量和尿NAG 、 RBP 、 α1-MG、γ-GTP含量.

sentences.en: There was a positive correlation between GPDA and N acetyl � � D glucosa minidase ( NAG ), urine minimal albumen ( UmA ).
sentences.cn: 尿GPDA与N乙酰βD氨基葡萄糖苷酶 ( NAG ) 和尿微量白蛋白 ( UmA ) 呈显著正相关.

sentences.en: Yet again I raised the question that had begun to nag at me.
sentences.cn: 可是,我又再一次提出了那个早就开始使我烦恼的问题.

sentences.en: You're not going to nag me again, are you?
sentences.cn: 你该不会又要跟我唠叨了 吧 ?

words.tran_cn: 唠叨的；挑剔的；使人不得安宁的
爱唠叨的人；尽找岔的人

phrases.tran_cn: v. 挑剔；唠叨；以唠叨来恼人

trans.tran_en: a horse, especially one that is old or in bad condition

trans.tran_cn: 唠叨，不断困扰，使不得安宁
trans.tran_en: to keep asking someone to do something, or to keep complaining to someone about their behaviour, in an annoying way
